#!/bin/bash
pip install python-daemon==2.1.2
git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/host-key-tools.git /root/host-key-tools
cd /root/host-key-tools/hostkey-py/
python setup.py install
cp /root/host-key-tools/ch-host-key-tools.service /usr/lib/systemd/system/host-key-tools.service
sed -i 's/ExecStart=.*/ExecStart=\/usr\/bin\/hostkeyd start -c https:\/\/comet-hn1.exogeni.net:8111\/ -s WORKFLOW -r WORKFLOWread -w WORKFLOWwrite -i NODENAME.novalocal/g' /usr/lib/systemd/system/host-key-tools.service
systemctl enable host-key-tools.service 
service host-key-tools.service start
echo 'SUBMIT via IPADDR' >> /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/route-eno1
/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifup-routes eno1
wget http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/storage.sh -O /root/storage.sh
sed -i 's/REPLACE/CIDR/g' /root/storage.sh
sh /root/storage.sh
